trans-unit.source: Paints an area with a radial gradient.
trans-unit.target: 绘制带有径向渐变的区域。

trans-unit.source: A focal point defines the beginning of the gradient, and a circle defines the end point of the gradient.
trans-unit.target: 焦点定义渐变的开始而圆定义渐变的结束点。

trans-unit.source: The RadialGradientBrush is similar in programming model to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>.
trans-unit.target: Radialgradientbrush 绘制中是类似的编程模型到<xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>

trans-unit.source: However, the linear gradient has a start and an end point to define the gradient vector, while the radial gradient has a circle, along with a focal point, to define the gradient behavior.
trans-unit.target: 但是，线性渐变有一个起点和时径向渐变有焦点点，以定义渐变的行为以及一个圆定义渐变向量中，将一个终结点。

trans-unit.source: The circle defines the end point of the gradient.
trans-unit.target: 圆定义渐变的终点。

trans-unit.source: In other words, a gradient stop at 1.0 defines the color at the circle's circumference.
trans-unit.target: 换而言之，处 1.0 的渐变停止点定义圆的周长处的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The focal point defines the center of the gradient.
trans-unit.target: 焦点定义渐变的中心。

trans-unit.source: A gradient stop at 0.0 defines the color at the focal point.
trans-unit.target: 处 0.0 的渐变停止点定义焦点点处的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The following image shows a rectangle filled with a radial gradient.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示使用径向渐变填充的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The radial gradient that goes from white to gray.
trans-unit.target: 径向渐变从白色变为灰色。

trans-unit.source: The outside circle represents the gradient circle while the red dot denotes the focal point.
trans-unit.target: 外部圆表示渐变圆圈，而红点表示焦点。

trans-unit.source: This gradient has its <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.SpreadMethod%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientSpreadMethod>.
trans-unit.target: 此渐变将其<xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.SpreadMethod%2A>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientSpreadMethod>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientSpreadMethod> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.SpreadMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![A radial gradient with highlighted components](~/add/media/art-radialgradientfocalpoint.jpg "A radial gradient with highlighted components") Radial gradient with a highlighted focal point > [!NOTE] > RadialGradientBrush objects are rendered using hardware acceleration on <xref:System.Windows.Media.RenderCapability.Tier%2A> 2 systems.
trans-unit.target: ![具有突出显示组件的径向渐变](~/add/media/art-radialgradientfocalpoint.jpg "具有突出显示组件的径向渐变")具有突出显示的焦点径向渐变 1> [!NOTE] 1> 呈现 radialgradientbrush 绘制对象上使用硬件加速<xref:System.Windows.Media.RenderCapability.Tier%2A>2 系统。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RenderCapability.Tier%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about hardware tiers, see [Graphics Rendering Tiers](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关硬件层的详细信息，请参阅[图形呈现层](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the RadialGradientBrush class provides several special features: RadialGradientBrush objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 可冻结功能，因为它继承自<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>类，radialgradientbrush 绘制类提供了一些特殊功能︰ 可以声明为在多个对象之间共享、 进行只读的以提高性能、 设为线程安全 radialgradientbrush 绘制对象和克隆，。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关提供的不同功能的详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush"></xref> class that has the specified gradient stops.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush"></xref>具有指定的渐变停止点的类。

trans-unit.source: The gradient stops to set on this brush.
trans-unit.target: 若要在此画笔上设置渐变停止点。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush"></xref> class with the specified start and stop colors.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush"></xref>使用指定的开始和停止颜色的类。

trans-unit.source: Color value at the focus (<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.GradientOrigin*>) of the radial gradient.
trans-unit.target: 处焦点的颜色值 (<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.GradientOrigin*>) 径向渐变。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.GradientOrigin*>

trans-unit.source: Color value at the outer edge of the radial gradient.
trans-unit.target: 在径向渐变的外边缘的颜色值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the center of the outermost circle of the radial gradient.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置径向渐变的最外面圆的中心。

trans-unit.source: The default central point location of the gradient circle is (0.5, 0.5).
trans-unit.target: 渐变圆的默认中心点位置为 （0.5，0.5）。

trans-unit.source: The two-dimensional point located at the center of the radial gradient.
trans-unit.target: 位于径向渐变中心的二维点。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.Center*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.Center*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.Center*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the two-dimensional focal point that defines the beginning of the gradient.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置定义渐变开始的二维焦点的位置。

trans-unit.source: The location of the two-dimensional focal point of the gradient.
trans-unit.target: 渐变的二维焦点的位置。

trans-unit.source: The default is (0.5, 0.5).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.GradientOrigin*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.GradientOrigin*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.GradientOrigin*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal radius of the outermost circle of the radial gradient.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置径向渐变的最外面圆的水平半径。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal radius of the outermost circle of the radial gradient.
trans-unit.target: 径向渐变的最外面圆的水平半径。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.5.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0.5。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusX*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusX*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusX*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the vertical radius of the outermost circle of a radial gradient.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置径向渐变的最外面圆的垂直半径。

trans-unit.source: The vertical radius of the outermost circle of a radial gradient.
trans-unit.target: 径向渐变的最外面圆的垂直半径。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.5.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0.5。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusY*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusY*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusY*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
